general_statements.statement: This is the nozzle of a 3D printer.
The nozzle extrudes material onto the print bed.
The nozzle appears to be moving along a predefined path.
Heated material is coming out of the nozzle.
The nozzle moves in coordination with the print head.
This nozzle is part of the printer’s extrusion system.
The nozzle’s diameter affects the precision of the print.
Material flow through the nozzle seems continuous.
The nozzle is close to the surface of the print bed.
Material is deposited layer by layer through the nozzle.
The nozzle operates within the defined build area.
The nozzle’s position is determined by the printer’s software.
The nozzle occasionally pauses while repositioning.
The nozzle’s alignment is critical for print accuracy.
The nozzle works in tandem with the feed mechanism.
The nozzle path outlines the shape of the printed part.
The nozzle's motion seems smooth and precise.
Material exits the nozzle in a semi-liquid state.
The nozzle’s movement speed influences print quality.
